Articles.Content:
I am making a planet pack with a new home world. However my KSC is underground.

Spoiler

https://imgur.com/gallery/IqwFxPZ 

	SpaceCenter
        {
            latitude = 0
            longitude = 2
            lodvisibleRangeMult = 6
            repositionRadiusOffset = 53
            
            groundColor = 0.2, 0.2, 0.2, 0.69
        }

Nevermind, I figured it out. I copied the spacecenter tag from after kerbin, and modified it. It looks like this now: 

	SpaceCenter
        {
			latitude = 0
			longitude = 28
			lodvisibleRangeMult = 6
			repositionRadiusOffset = 2978
			reorientFinalAngle = 101
			
			decalLatitude = 0
			decalLongitude = 28
			heightMapDeformity = 0
			absoluteOffset = 3000
			absolute = true
			radius = 4200
			angle = 180
            
            groundColor = 0.2, 0.2, 0.2, 0.69
        }
